languages.text: [Нежно сжать протянутую руку] "Наконец-то мы стали чуточку ближе".

traits.locale_text: [Нежно сжать протянутую руку] "Наконец-то мы стали чуточку ближе".

languages.text: [Tenderly squeeze her outstretched hand] "At last, we have become a little bit closer."
languages.original_text: [Нежно сжать протянутую руку] "Наконец-то мы стали чуточку ближе".

[Tenderly squeeze her outstretched hand] "At last, we have become a little bit closer."
[Tenderly squeeze her outstretched hand] "At last, we have become a little bit closer."
[Tenderly squeeze her outstretched hand] "At last, we have become a little bit closer."

languages.text: [Apretar con ternura su mano extendida] «Por fin estamos un poco más unidos».
languages.original_text: [Tenderly squeeze her outstretched hand] "At last, we have become a little bit closer."

traits.locale_text: [Apretar con ternura su mano extendida] «Por fin estamos un poco más unidos».

languages.text: [彼女が差し出した手を優しく握る]「ようやくお前に少し近づくことができた」
languages.original_text: [Tenderly squeeze her outstretched hand] "At last, we have become a little bit closer."

traits.locale_text: [彼女が差し出した手を優しく握る]「ようやくお前に少し近づくことができた」

languages.text: [温柔地握住她伸出的手]“终于，我们离彼此又更近了一步。”
languages.original_text: [Tenderly squeeze her outstretched hand] "At last, we have become a little bit closer."

traits.locale_text: [温柔地握住她伸出的手]“终于，我们离彼此又更近了一步。”

languages.text: [Serrer tendrement sa main tendue] « Au moins, nous nous sommes {mf|rapprochés|rapprochées} l'{mf|un|une} de l'autre. »
languages.original_text: [Tenderly squeeze her outstretched hand] "At last, we have become a little bit closer."

traits.locale_text: [Serrer tendrement sa main tendue] « Au moins, nous nous sommes {mf|rapprochés|rapprochées} l'{mf|un|une} de l'autre. »

languages.text: [Sanft ihre ausgestreckte Hand drücken] "Endlich kommen wir uns ein wenig näher."
languages.original_text: [Tenderly squeeze her outstretched hand] "At last, we have become a little bit closer."

traits.locale_text: [Sanft ihre ausgestreckte Hand drücken] "Endlich kommen wir uns ein wenig näher."

languages.text: [Cassia'nın uzattığı eli şefkatle sık] "Nihayet biraz yakınlaşabildik."
languages.original_text: [Tenderly squeeze her outstretched hand] "At last, we have become a little bit closer."

traits.locale_text: [Cassia'nın uzattığı eli şefkatle sık] "Nihayet biraz yakınlaşabildik."
